description:
'''This Mortal Coil''' were a British [[Musical collective|music collective]] led by [[Ivo Watts-Russell]], founder of the British record label [[4AD]]. Although Watts-Russell and [[John Fryer (music)|John Fryer]] were the only two official members, the band's recorded output featured a large rotating cast of supporting artists, many of whom were otherwise associated with 4AD, including members of [[Cocteau Twins]], [[Pixies (band)|Pixies]] and [[Dead Can Dance]].

The project is known for its gothic, [[dream pop]] sound, and released three albums: ''[[It'll End in Tears]]'' (1984), ''[[Filigree & Shadow]]'' (1986) and ''[[Blood (This Mortal Coil album)|Blood]]'' (1991).
